articles.description: Defences were not on top as Manchester City and Chelsea played out an epic eight-goal thriller where, finally, football was the main talking point.
articles.title: 'Premier League at its best' - where does Chelsea 4-4 Man City rank?

articles.description: Liverpool boss was taken back to his early days of his coaching career as the Reds beat Brentford to close the gap on Premier League leaders Manchester City.
articles.title: Liverpool close the gap as Klopp reminded of his roots

articles.description: As comebacks go, Arsenal's recovery to thrash Leicester 6-2 was pretty incredible - is it the start of something special for Jonas Eidevall's side?
articles.title: 'The Arsenal way' - clinical Gunners finding form

articles.description: Late replacement Harriet Dart beats Caijsa Hennemann to give Great Britain a 3-1 victory in their Billie Jean King Cup play-off against Sweden.
articles.title: Late replacement Dart seals GB win in BJK Cup tie

articles.description: Chelsea have gone from a chaotic match one week to a classic the next, but the Londoners are showing the green shoots of recovery under manager Mauricio Pochettino, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Chelsea showing green shoots of recovery under Pochettino'

articles.description: Match of the Day 2-s Alan Shearer, Ian Wright and Mark Chapman analyse how ex-Manchester City player Cole Palmer has made an impact at Chelsea.
articles.title: MOTD analysis: How 'magnificent' Palmer created vital Chelsea impact

articles.description: Which Premier League players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Which player gave a 'definitive' response? - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers praises Celtic for easing midweek Champions League "pain" with a symmetrical six-goal hammering of an acquiescent Aberdeen in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: 'Pain' relief as Celtic hit dismal Dons for six

articles.description: How Brighton's win over Manchester City shows the Women's Super League is becoming more competitive.
articles.title: WSL is 'more competitive' with latest Brighton shock

articles.description: Watch highlights of India's batting as the hosts make it nine wins from nine World Cup matches with a 160-run victory over the Netherlands.
articles.title: India's batters inspire big win over Netherlands
